channel.title: Mipi on Dartcoms lair
channel.description: Recent content in Mipi on Dartcoms lair

item.title: Driving an obscure VR display
item.description: A little bit of context. Back in 2021 I was looking to get my self a proper set of fpv goggles. Ever since I started flying fpv drones back in 2018 the one thing that stayed on the back of my mind, was how our fpv goggles were the only thing that the fpv community treated as a black box
